decision_conditions: The applicant seeks to discharge conditions  5, 6 and 8 of planning permission ref 24/00089/FUL. Officers consider the information submitted in relation to Condition 8 (Fire Safety Strategy) to be acceptable however, the details submitted to discharge condition  5 (refuse bins)  and condition 6 (cycle storage) are deemed  to be unacceptable and therefore the application 24/01963/CLC is unacceptable as a whole.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Approval of details pursuant to conditions 05 (Refuse bins), 06 (Cycle storage), and 08 (Fire safety strategy) of planning permission ref; 24/00089/FUL dated 16.02.2024 (Application under Section 73A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Drawings) for Application Reference Number: 20/01293/FUL (Variation of Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 18/14880/FUL (Erection of single storey rear extension. Erection of first floor side extension to provide self contained two storey dwelling) dated 08/11/2018 consisting of the erection of an enclosed single storey front porch) dated 03/08/2020. Variation to consist of change to the pitch of the rear extension roof and the erection of upstand wall between the subject and neighbouring properties. (Retrospective)
